mapper.select: SELECT pc.id as id, pc.company_id as companyId, pc.position_id as positionId, p.name AS positionName, c.full_name AS companyName, pc.create_time AS createTime FROM bt_position_company pc LEFT JOIN bt_position p ON p.id = pc.position_id LEFT JOIN bt_company c ON c.id = pc.company_id WHERE pc.position_id = #{positionId}

and pc.position_id = #{positionId}
